title: Golden State Warriors coach Steve Kerr to take leave of absence
text:
Published By: Baltimore Sun: NBA - Today 
Golden State Warriors coach Steve Kerr will take a leave of absence as he recovers from back surgery and will be replaced on an interim basi...
